summary:
A beautifully crafted mammoth tusk bow with dragonscale reinforcing. Also has; a snow fox pelt hand-grip, gold & silver wiring, gold thread stitching, silver bow-tips with gold inlay, and dragon gut & sinew bowstring.

A true archer\'s bow, does slightly more damage than a daedric bow.
descriptionHtml:
The Composite Tusk Bow has moved!

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12787-1-1334575350.jpg[/img]

I have included the same bow under a different name in my new mod - 

-------------------------------------------------------
Better Bows by Howiego08
-------------------------------------------------------

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13317

Please visit check out the above mod for more bow-y goodness.


PS. I have had to rename the bow so as not to conflict with the existing Composite Tusk Bow. Sorry for the hassle, but I figure this was preferable to having the existing bow dissapear from your inventory.

Hope you enjoy!
author: Howiego08
